stories.title: For the first time a photonics coprocessor is integrated in a HPC and in Top500

stories.text:
Wouldn't it be nice if you could ask anyone and everyone to take a look at your code? As developers, we know code can be tricky to read – even for the original developer.

You spend lots of time writing code, but when it comes time to debug and understand it… well, that's where things get hairy.

I'm working on a solution called Explain Code App for this, which brings me here to reach out to others in order to truly bring a solution to the community as a whole. Here is the link: https://www.explaincode.app/

With that said, I'm looking for people who would like early access to the platform and test out the tools and provide feedback. Thank you so much!
